trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Pembroke Pines
There were no other sightings in Pembroke Pines on or around September 30th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was getting ready to go to bed, but I decided to walk my dog in the backyard at 10:50 pm. When I go out, I was looking up at the stars, as I usually do every night when I walk my dog. When on my right peripheral vision, I notice something moving in the sky. I focused on this thing and at first i thought is was a formation of birds, but then I realized that whatever I was looking at, was in SPACE! I was looking at a triangular formation of dim lights in space as it traveled from north to south right over my backyard. The shape was like the outline of an ice cream cone. I stood there with my mouth wide open, trying not to lose sight of it. In the mean time, I was trying to count the lights. One was in the front and I counted at least five on one side. I really couldn't concentrate on counting the lights because my mind was racing and my heart rate was increasing! On top of that, I was being distracted by the falling meteors that would flash and disappear. The lights I was observing were way above the meteors that were falling. That's way I know these lights were in space. Though, I couldn't tell if it was one solid object or multiple individual objects. After, I lost sight of the lights, I brought the dog in and I ran up to my son's room and told him what I just saw. We both came down and went out back and pulled a couple of chairs and sat there for 45 minutes hoping we would see something else. All we saw were a couple more meteors falling and one airplane in the 45 minutes we were out there.
Summary: Triangular formation of multiple lights in the sky.
